Room.Name: Rutger's Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a short hallway between stairways, on the top floor of the castle.
Room.LongDescription: Several doors along here open to plush rooms which are the main residence for Prince Rutger's family. To the west is a secretary's desk at the head of the noble's stairway, and to the east you see a guard station and a metal door. Sweet smelling candles light the hallway along here.
